import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({cartItems,setcartItems}){ function increaseqty(item){ if(item.product.stock==itemqty){ return; } setqty((state)=>state+1) } function decreaseqty(){ if(qty>1){ setqty((state)=>state-1) } } return

Your Cart: {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item)=>(
{item.product.name}

${item.product.price}

- +
))}

Est. total: $245.67

}
